com.teamten.chess
Class Piece

java.lang.Object
  com.teamten.chess.Piece

public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a piece of a type and color.

Method Detail

getPieceType

public PieceType getPieceType()
Return the piece type (king, queen, etc) for this piece, or null if an empty square.

getSide

public int getSide()
Return the side (Side.WHITE or Side.BLACK) for this piece, or 0 if an empty square.

getCharacter

public char getCharacter()
Return the character that can be used to represent this piece in ASCII mode.

getUnicodeCharacter

public char getUnicodeCharacter()
Returns the char for the Unicode character. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chess_symbols_in_Unicode

getHtmlCharacter

public java.lang.String getHtmlCharacter()
Same as getUnicodeCharacter() but as an HTML entity.

addMoves

public void addMoves(Board board,
                     int index,
                     boolean capturesOnly,
                     java.util.List<Move> moveList)
Adds the moves possible by this piece at this position on this board.

isOtherSide

public boolean isOtherSide(int otherSide)
Return whether this piece is from the other side as the specified side. Empty squares are never on the other side.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

public static Piece getPieceForCharacter(char ch)
Return the piece that would have returned this from its getCharacter() method.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if none is found.

public static Piece getPieceForTypeAndSide(PieceType pieceType,

Return the piece for this piece type and side.
